cards.name: Akroma's Memorial
cards.text: Creatures you control have flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, and protection from black and from red.
cards.flavor:
"No rest. No mercy. No matter what."
—Memorial inscription

cards.name: Angel of Salvation
cards.text:
Flash; convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Flying
When Angel of Salvation enters the battlefield, prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of target creatures and/or players, divided as you choose.

cards.name: Arc Blade
cards.text:
Arc Blade deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Exile Arc Blade with three time counters on it.
Suspend 3—{2}{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{R} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Arcanum Wings
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
Aura swap {2}{U} ({2}{U}: Exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.)
cards.flavor: Nobles don wings to reach the sky villas of their peers, exchanging them for more fashionable attire upon arrival.

cards.name: Augur il-Vec
cards.text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Sacrifice Augur il-Vec: You gain 4 life. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
cards.flavor: "If it would end this exile, my life is yours."

cards.name: Augur of Skulls
cards.text:
{1}{B}: Regenerate Augur of Skulls.
Sacrifice Augur of Skulls: Target player discards two cards. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
cards.flavor: Within each empty skull, it seeks ways to preserve its own failing undeath.

cards.name: Aven Augur
cards.text:
Flying
Sacrifice Aven Augur: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
cards.flavor: "I have seen the future. It does not include you."

cards.name: Aven Mindcensor
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
If an opponent would search a library, that player searches the top four cards of that library instead.

cards.name: Barren Glory
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control no permanents other than Barren Glory and have no cards in hand, you win the game.
cards.flavor:
"The only perfect world is an empty world, with no one to sin or wage war."
—Tarran, magus of the disk

cards.name: Baru, Fist of Krosa
cards.text:
Whenever a Forest enters the battlefield, green creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
Grandeur — Discard another card named Baru, Fist of Krosa: Put an X/X green Wurm creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the number of lands you control.

cards.name: Bitter Ordeal
cards.text:
Search target player's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
Gravestorm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each permanent put into a graveyard this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

cards.name: Bloodshot Trainee
cards.text: {T}: Bloodshot Trainee deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate this ability only if Bloodshot Trainee's power is 4 or greater.
cards.flavor: "Hrrngh! Someday I'm going to hurl this . . . er . . . roll this . . . hrrngh . . . nudge this boulder right down a cliff."

cards.name: Bogardan Lancer
cards.text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

cards.name: Boldwyr Intimidator
cards.text:
Cowards can't block Warriors.
{R}: Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn.
{2}{R}: Target creature becomes a Warrior until end of turn.

cards.name: Bonded Fetch
cards.text:
Defender, haste
{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
cards.flavor: A well-made homunculus grooms the mind of its master, pruning the thoughts that lead to madness. Few loredelvers survive the study of the infinite without one.

cards.name: Bound in Silence
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
cards.flavor: A fight put off forever is already won.

cards.name: Bridge from Below
cards.text:
Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.
When a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, if Bridge from Below is in your graveyard, exile Bridge from Below.

cards.name: Centaur Omenreader
cards.text: As long as Centaur Omenreader is tapped, creature spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
cards.flavor: The wisdom of the omenreaders is legendary. Creatures travel for miles through icy peril to seek their counsel.

cards.name: Char-Rumbler
cards.text:
Double strike
{R}: Char-Rumbler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Elementals flourished as Dominaria healed and new forms of life adapted to the land's reinfusion with mana.

cards.name: Chronomantic Escape
cards.text:
Until your next turn, creatures can't attack you. Exile Chronomantic Escape with three time counters on it.
Suspend 3—{2}{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Cloud Key
cards.text:
As Cloud Key enters the battlefield, choose artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, or sorcery.
Spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor: The musical sound of its turning triggers the tumblers of revelation.

cards.name: Cloudseeder
cards.text:
Flying
{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token named Cloud Sprite onto the battlefield. It has flying and "Cloud Sprite can block only creatures with flying."

cards.name: Coalition Relic
cards.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
{T}: Put a charge counter on Coalition Relic.
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all charge counters from Coalition Relic. Add one mana of any color to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

cards.name: Cryptic Annelid
cards.text: When Cryptic Annelid enters the battlefield, scry 1, then scry 2, then scry 3. (To scry X, look at the top X cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Cutthroat il-Dal
cards.text: Hellbent — Cutthroat il-Dal has shadow as long as you have no cards in hand. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
cards.flavor: Her blades slashed across the noble's shadow. He scoffed, then fell over dead.

cards.name: Cyclical Evolution
cards.text:
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Exile Cyclical Evolution with three time counters on it.
Suspend 3—{2}{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{G} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Dakmor Salvage
cards.text:
Dakmor Salvage enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.
Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

cards.name: Darksteel Garrison
cards.text:
Fortified land has indestructible.
Whenever fortified land becomes tapped, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Fortify {3} ({3}: Attach to target land you control. Fortify only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the land leaves.)

cards.name: Daybreak Coronet
cards.text:
Enchant creature with another Aura attached to it
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has first strike, vigilance, and lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

cards.name: Death Rattle
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Destroy target nongreen creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Deepcavern Imp
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Echo—Discard a card. (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

cards.name: Delay
cards.text: Counter target spell. If the spell is countered this way, exile it with three time counters on it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, remove a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, the player plays it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

cards.name: Dryad Arbor
cards.text: (Dryad Arbor isn't a spell, it's affected by summoning sickness, and it has "{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.")
cards.flavor:
"Touch no tree, break no branch, and speak only the question you wish answered."
—Von Yomm, elder druid, to her initiates

cards.name: Dust of Moments
cards.text:
Choose one —
• Remove two time counters from each permanent and each suspended card.
• Put two time counters on each permanent with a time counter on it and each suspended card.

cards.name: Edge of Autumn
cards.text:
If you control four or fewer lands, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
Cycling—Sacrifice a land. (Sacrifice a land, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: "At harvest are seeds of next year sown."

cards.name: Emberwilde Augur
cards.text: Sacrifice Emberwilde Augur: Emberwilde Augur deals 3 damage to target player. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
cards.flavor: Legends say a djinn gave the goblins a gift they could never hope to master.

cards.name: Emblem of the Warmind
cards.text:
Enchant creature you control
Creatures you control have haste.
cards.flavor:
"It takes but one spark to ignite a parched forest. Our hearts, I fear, are too dry for this new visitor."
—Elek Longbeard

cards.name: Epochrasite
cards.text:
Epochrasite enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it if you didn't cast it from your hand.
When Epochrasite dies, exile it with three time counters on it and it gains suspend. (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast this card without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

cards.name: Even the Odds
cards.text:
Cast Even the Odds only if you control fewer creatures than each opponent.
Put three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor:
"They who fall singing the battle hymn of Benalia go not unavenged."
—Adom Capashen, Benalish commander

cards.name: Fatal Attraction
cards.text:
Enchant creature
When Fatal Attraction enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to enchanted creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, Fatal Attraction deals 4 damage to enchanted creature.

cards.name: Festering March
cards.text:
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn. Exile Festering March with three time counters on it.
Suspend 3—{2}{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{B} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Fleshwrither
cards.text: Transfigure {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Sacrifice this creature: Search your library for a creature card with the same converted mana cost as this creature and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. Transfigure only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Flowstone Embrace
cards.text:
Enchant creature
{T}: Enchanted creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The seventh symbol, the Mark of Stone, stores the power of ancient Rath."
—Tome of Elemental Mastery

cards.name: Force of Savagery
cards.text: Trample
cards.flavor:
"Life cannot be created and then abandoned. It must be nurtured and fed so that it may express its ripened might."
—Freyalise

cards.name: Foresee
cards.text: Scry 4, then draw two cards. (To scry 4, look at the top four cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
cards.flavor: Wind time's watch, and watch time unwind.

cards.name: Frenzy Sliver
cards.text: All Sliver creatures have frenzy 1. (Whenever a Sliver attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)
cards.flavor: The Arturan conjurers took the strange, alien fossil and patterned their own twisted creations in its image.

cards.name: Gathan Raiders
cards.text:
Hellbent — Gathan Raiders gets +2/+2 as long as you have no cards in hand.
Morph—Discard a card. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Ghostfire
cards.text:
Ghostfire is colorless.
Ghostfire deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Only those gifted with the eye of Ugin, the spirit dragon, can see his fiery breath.

cards.name: Gibbering Descent
cards.text:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses 1 life and discards a card.
Hellbent — Skip your upkeep step if you have no cards in hand.
Madness {2}{B}{B} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Gift of Granite
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
cards.flavor: The blessing adds both protection to the recipient and weightlessness to the stone.

cards.name: Glittering Wish
cards.text: You may choose a multicolored card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Glittering Wish.
cards.flavor: She wished for gold, but not for the strength to carry it.

cards.name: Goldmeadow Lookout
cards.text: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token named Goldmeadow Harrier onto the battlefield. It has "{W}, {T}: Tap target creature."

cards.name: Grave Peril
cards.text: When a nonblack creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice Grave Peril. If you do, destroy that creature.
cards.flavor:
"Sometimes the grave does not wait for death before relishing its feast of flesh and bones."
—Ezrith, druid of the Dark Hours

cards.name: Grave Scrabbler
cards.text:
Madness {1}{B} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)
When Grave Scrabbler enters the battlefield, if its madness cost was paid, you may return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Graven Cairns
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{B/R}, {T}: Add {B}{B}, {B}{R}, or {R}{R} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: Shamans of Kar-Sengir claim that their sun sets because it can no longer bear the gaze of those pain-carved cliffs.

cards.name: Grinning Ignus
cards.text: {R}, Return Grinning Ignus to its owner's hand: Add {2}{R} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
cards.flavor:
"Take care what you offer the ignus. Food, perhaps. Coins. But nothing flammable!"
—Stovic, village eccentric

cards.name: Grove of the Burnwillows
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Each opponent gains 1 life.
cards.flavor: Spring is the most beautiful season in the grove, when the new leaves open from their ember-buds in a race of leaping flames.

cards.name: Haze of Rage
cards.text:
Buyback {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

cards.name: Heartwood Storyteller
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, each of that player's opponents may draw a card.
cards.flavor: His roots reach deep, nurtured not by soil and rain, but by millennia of experience.

cards.name: Henchfiend of Ukor
cards.text:
Haste
Echo {1}{B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice this permanent unless you pay its echo cost.)
{B/R}: Henchfiend of Ukor gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Homing Sliver
cards.text:
Each Sliver card in each player's hand has slivercycling {3}.
Slivercycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Sliver card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

cards.name: Horizon Canopy
cards.text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Horizon Canopy: Draw a card.
cards.flavor: The great leaves are resilient underfoot. Heavy steps do not bruise them, but release a sweet and spicy scent.

cards.name: Ichor Slick
cards.text:
Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
Madness {3}{B} (If you discard this card, you may cast it for its madness cost instead of putting it into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Imperial Mask
cards.text:
When Imperial Mask enters the battlefield, if it's not a token, each of your teammates puts a token that's a copy of Imperial Mask onto the battlefield.
You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

cards.name: Imperiosaur
cards.text: Spend only mana produced by basic lands to cast Imperiosaur.
cards.flavor:
"An ancient, powerful force has overtaken the valley. I sympathize for its former inhabitants, but I rejoice for the land itself."
—Olanti, Muraganda druid

cards.name: Infiltrator il-Kor
cards.text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Suspend 2—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

cards.name: Intervention Pact
cards.text:
The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. You gain life equal to the damage prevented this way.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {1}{W}{W}. If you don't, you lose the game.

cards.name: Jhoira of the Ghitu
cards.text: {2}, Exile a nonland card from your hand: Put four time counters on the exiled card. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

cards.name: Judge Unworthy
cards.text: Choose target attacking or blocking creature. Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. Judge Unworthy deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that creature. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Kavu Primarch
cards.text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
If Kavu Primarch was kicked, it enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

cards.name: Keldon Megaliths
cards.text:
Keldon Megaliths enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
Hellbent — {1}{R}, {T}: Keldon Megaliths deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only if you have no cards in hand.

cards.name: Knight of Sursi
cards.text:
Flying; flanking  (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
Suspend 3—{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

cards.name: Korlash, Heir to Blackblade
cards.text:
Korlash, Heir to Blackblade's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.
{1}{B}: Regenerate Korlash.
Grandeur — Discard another card named Korlash, Heir to Blackblade: Search your library for up to two Swamp cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Leaden Fists
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

cards.name: Linessa, Zephyr Mage
cards.text:
{X}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target creature with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand.
Grandeur — Discard another card named Linessa, Zephyr Mage: Target player returns a creature he or she controls to its owner's hand, then repeats this process for an artifact, an enchantment, and a land.

cards.name: Llanowar Augur
cards.text: Sacrifice Llanowar Augur: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
cards.flavor: "I am irrelevant. The future I hold in my hands is everything."

cards.name: Llanowar Empath
cards.text: When Llanowar Empath enters the battlefield, scry 2, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it into your hand. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Llanowar Mentor
cards.text: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a 1/1 green Elf Druid creature token named Llanowar Elves onto the battlefield. It has "{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool."

cards.name: Llanowar Reborn
cards.text:
Llanowar Reborn enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
Graft 1 (This land enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this land onto it.)

cards.name: Logic Knot
cards.text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.

cards.name: Lost Auramancers
cards.text:
Vanishing 3 (This permanent enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When Lost Auramancers dies, if it had no time counters on it, you may search your library for an enchantment card and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

cards.name: Lost Hours
cards.text: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player puts that card into his or her library third from the top.
cards.flavor:
"Your thoughts do not interest me nearly as much as the absence thereof."
—Gorghul, augur of skulls

cards.name: Lucent Liminid
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: It is a herald of the sun goddess, projected from the hallowed glass whenever her light passes through.

cards.name: Lumithread Field
cards.text:
Creatures you control get +0/+1.
Morph {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: Having conquered the Bastion of Suns, the Ota took its light for their own.

cards.name: Lymph Sliver
cards.text: All Sliver creatures have absorb 1. (If a source would deal damage to a Sliver, prevent 1 of that damage.)
cards.flavor: Its skin remains in a flowing, liquid state that keeps its body coated with potent restorative lymph.

cards.name: Maelstrom Djinn
cards.text:
Flying
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Maelstrom Djinn is turned face up, put two time counters on it and it gains vanishing. (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

cards.name: Magus of the Abyss
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of his or her choice. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor: He climbs a staircase of falling souls, fighting the continuous pull of the void.

cards.name: Magus of the Future
cards.text:
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
You may play the top card of your library.
cards.flavor: Those gifted with the sight have one eye in the present and the other in the future.

cards.name: Magus of the Moat
cards.text: Creatures without flying can't attack.
cards.flavor: "The spirits of the mythic ones ever circle their beloved keep, forbidding entry to all who come with the heavy tread of hate."

cards.name: Magus of the Moon
cards.text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.
cards.flavor: Tidal forces of the blood moon wrench and buckle the land, drawing monoliths of stone and soil toward the flaming orb.

cards.name: Magus of the Vineyard
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, add {G}{G} to that player's mana pool.
cards.flavor: Battered and beaten by years of salt and claw, he never ceased to walk, and to seed. Only now, in this time of rebirth, do his seeds take root.

cards.name: Marshaling Cry
cards.text:
Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Mesmeric Sliver
cards.text: All Slivers have "When this permanent enters the battlefield, you may fateseal 1." (To fateseal 1, its controller looks at the top card of an opponent's library, then he or she may put that card on the bottom of that library.)

cards.name: Minions' Murmurs
cards.text: You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of creatures you control.
cards.flavor:
"They are quick to offer advice, those whose mistakes doomed them to undeath. How can I not listen to the wisdom of failure?"
—Ratadrabik of Urborg

cards.name: Mistmeadow Skulk
cards.text: Lifelink, protection from converted mana cost 3 or greater
cards.flavor: Doyo suspected the boggarts of brewing a plot against his crop, so he scythed away his grain to clear the sightlines.

cards.name: Molten Disaster
cards.text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
If Molten Disaster was kicked, it has split second. (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Molten Disaster deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

cards.name: Muraganda Petroglyphs
cards.text: Creatures with no abilities get +2/+2.
cards.flavor: Some mages forsake their scrolls and libraries to learn at the feet of ancient trees and sacred stones.

cards.name: Mystic Speculation
cards.text:
Buyback {2} (You may pay an additional {2} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Nacatl War-Pride
cards.text:
Nacatl War-Pride must be blocked by exactly one creature if able.
Whenever Nacatl War-Pride attacks, put X tokens that are copies of Nacatl War-Pride onto the battlefield tapped and attacking, where X is the number of creatures defending player controls. Exile the tokens at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Narcomoeba
cards.text:
Flying
When Narcomoeba is put into your graveyard from your library, you may put it onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: It was created by the Iquati as a living memory—one that objects to being forgotten.

cards.name: New Benalia
cards.text:
New Benalia enters the battlefield tapped.
When New Benalia enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Nihilith
cards.text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
Suspend 7—{1}{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{B} and exile it with seven time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)
Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, if Nihilith is suspended, you may remove a time counter from Nihilith.

cards.name: Nimbus Maze
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control an Island.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only if you control a Plains.
cards.flavor: To find its center is to find one's own.

cards.name: Nix
cards.text: Counter target spell if no mana was spent to cast it.
cards.flavor:
"There is no shortcut to work done true and well. The Creators learned this to their sorrow, the first time they made the world."
—Githri the Prisoner

cards.name: Oblivion Crown
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "Discard a card: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."

cards.name: Oriss, Samite Guardian
cards.text:
{T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
Grandeur — Discard another card named Oriss, Samite Guardian: Target player can't cast spells this turn, and creatures that player controls can't attack this turn.

cards.name: Pact of Negation
cards.text:
Counter target spell.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {3}{U}{U}. If you don't, you lose the game.
cards.flavor: Those who expect betrayal at every turn are seldom disappointed.

cards.name: Pact of the Titan
cards.text:
Put a 4/4 red Giant creature token onto the battlefield.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {4}{R}. If you don't, you lose the game.

cards.name: Patrician's Scorn
cards.text:
If you've cast another white spell this turn, you may cast Patrician's Scorn without paying its mana cost.
Destroy all enchantments.
cards.flavor: Lady Farisa's contempt of tawdry kitsch grew even more infamous after her death.

cards.name: Petrified Plating
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Phosphorescent Feast
cards.text: Chroma — Reveal any number of cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each green mana symbol in those cards' mana costs.
cards.flavor:
"Mushroom Queen sits among her spores,
Enjoying life and avoiding chores."
—Ibblian pixie ditty

cards.name: Pooling Venom
cards.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.
{3}{B}: Destroy enchanted land.
cards.flavor: The land can only hold so much poison before it begins to bite back.

cards.name: Putrid Cyclops
cards.text: When Putrid Cyclops enters the battlefield, scry 1, then reveal the top card of your library. Putrid Cyclops gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is that card's converted mana cost. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

cards.name: Pyromancer's Swath
cards.text:
If an instant or sorcery source you control would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals that much damage plus 2 to that creature or player instead.
At the beginning of each end step, discard your hand.

cards.name: Quagnoth
cards.text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Quagnoth, return it to your hand.

cards.name: Quiet Disrepair
cards.text:
Enchant artifact or enchantment
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one —
• Destroy enchanted permanent.
• You gain 2 life.
cards.flavor:
"Artifice has always stood upon nature's shoulders. Let us watch nature take a turn."
—Freyalise

cards.name: Ramosian Revivalist
cards.text: {6}, {T}: Return target Rebel permanent card with converted mana cost 5 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
cards.flavor: The Ramosian tradition is alive, but its namesake has long since been forgotten.

cards.name: Ravaging Riftwurm
cards.text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Vanishing 2 (This permanent enters the battlefield with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
If Ravaging Riftwurm was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three additional time counters on it.

cards.name: Reality Strobe
cards.text:
Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Exile Reality Strobe with three time counters on it.
Suspend 3—{2}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{U} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: Riddle of Lightning
cards.text: Choose target creature or player. Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. Riddle of Lightning deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that creature or player. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Rift Elemental
cards.text: {1}{R}, Remove a time counter from a permanent you control or suspended card you own: Rift Elemental gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"It's difficult to heal a rift after it begins wandering about on its own."
—Teferi

cards.name: Riftsweeper
cards.text: When Riftsweeper enters the battlefield, choose target face-up exiled card. Its owner shuffles it into his or her library.
cards.flavor: "Beings of the rifts are not natural. No longer will these abominations tread upon the body of Gaea."

cards.name: Rites of Flourishing
cards.text:
At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.
Each player may play an additional land on each of his or her turns.
cards.flavor: "Dance, and bring forth the coil! It is an umbilical to Gaea herself, fattening us with the earth's rich bounty."

cards.name: River of Tears
cards.text: {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. If you played a land this turn, add {B} to your mana pool instead.
cards.flavor:
"The Westfolk wept, and their tears wore winding rivers into the cheek of the world."
—Glem the Lonebard, "Origins of Kholon"

cards.name: Saltskitter
cards.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, exile Saltskitter. Return Saltskitter to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Samite Censer-Bearer
cards.text: {W}, Sacrifice Samite Censer-Bearer: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to each creature you control this turn.
cards.flavor: Samite alchemists extracted aromatic traces of healing minerals from the residue of the receding salt dunes.

cards.name: Sarcomite Myr
cards.text:
{2}: Sarcomite Myr gains flying until end of turn.
{2}, Sacrifice Sarcomite Myr: Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"A horrible sight, yes, but the sounds . . . Its twanging tendons and grinding gears are almost musical."
—Brudiclad, Telchor engineer

cards.name: Scourge of Kher Ridges
cards.text:
Flying
{1}{R}: Scourge of Kher Ridges deals 2 damage to each creature without flying.
{5}{R}: Scourge of Kher Ridges deals 6 damage to each other creature with flying.
cards.flavor: Doom casts its own flickering shadow.

cards.name: Scout's Warning
cards.text:
The next creature card you play this turn can be played as though it had flash.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: "There is no tactic I enjoy more than ambushing the ambushers."

cards.name: Second Wind
cards.text:
Enchant creature
{T}: Tap enchanted creature.
{T}: Untap enchanted creature.
cards.flavor: Vindr stormchasers believe that the same ancient forces that move the winds can also move mortal minds and hearts.

cards.name: Seht's Tiger
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Seht's Tiger enters the battlefield, you gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything of the chosen color.)

cards.name: Shah of Naar Isle
cards.text:
Trample
Echo {0} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Shah of Naar Isle's echo cost is paid, each opponent may draw up to three cards.

cards.name: Shapeshifter's Marrow
cards.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, that player reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's a creature card, the player puts the card into his or her graveyard and Shapeshifter's Marrow becomes a copy of that card. (If it does, it loses this ability.)

cards.name: Shimian Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Shimian Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

cards.name: Shivan Sand-Mage
cards.text:
When Shivan Sand-Mage enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Remove two time counters from target permanent or suspended card.
• Put two time counters on target permanent with a time counter on it or suspended card.
Suspend 4—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

cards.name: Skirk Ridge Exhumer
cards.text: {B}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a 1/1 black Zombie Goblin creature token named Festering Goblin onto the battlefield. It has "When Festering Goblin dies, target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn."

cards.name: Skizzik Surger
cards.text:
Haste
Echo—Sacrifice two lands. (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

cards.name: Slaughter Pact
cards.text:
Destroy target nonblack creature.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{B}. If you don't, you lose the game.
cards.flavor: Death is only the beginning of the end.

cards.name: Sliver Legion
cards.text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1 for each other Sliver on the battlefield.
cards.flavor: Hidden within the clicking, chittering swarm is a unique mind, still young, but growing more aware as time passes.

cards.name: Sliversmith
cards.text: {1}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a 1/1 colorless Sliver artifact creature token named Metallic Sliver onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: After centuries of labor, its creations outnumber those they were to mimic.

cards.name: Snake Cult Initiation
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has poisonous 3. (Whenever it deals combat damage to a player, that player gets three poison counters. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

cards.name: Soultether Golem
cards.text:
Vanishing 1 (This permanent enters the battlefield with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a time counter on Soultether Golem.

cards.name: Sparkspitter
cards.text: {R}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a 3/1 red Elemental creature token named Spark Elemental onto the battlefield. It has trample, haste, and "At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Elemental."

cards.name: Spellweaver Volute
cards.text:
Enchant instant card in a graveyard
Whenever you cast a sorcery spell, copy the enchanted instant card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. If you do, exile the enchanted card and attach Spellweaver Volute to another instant card in a graveyard.

cards.name: Spellwild Ouphe
cards.text: Spells that target Spellwild Ouphe cost {2} less to cast.
cards.flavor:
"You'd think that their big glowing eyes would be almost hypnotic to look at. In fact, it's the other way around—they are entranced by nearly everything they see."
—Balecki, Spellwild druid

cards.name: Spin into Myth
cards.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library, then fateseal 2. (To fateseal 2, look at the top two cards of an opponent's library, then put any number of them on the bottom of that player's library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Spirit en-Dal
cards.text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Forecast — {1}{W}, Reveal Spirit en-Dal from your hand: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn. (Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.)

cards.name: Sporoloth Ancient
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Sporoloth Ancient.
Creatures you control have "Remove two spore counters from this creature: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield."

cards.name: Sprout Swarm
cards.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Steamflogger Boss
cards.text:
Other Rigger creatures you control get +1/+0 and have haste.
If a Rigger you control would assemble a Contraption, it assembles two Contraptions instead.
cards.flavor:
"Whip the Xs ! Pinch the Os!
What we're building, no one knows!"

cards.name: Storm Entity
cards.text:
Haste
Storm Entity enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other spell cast this turn.
cards.flavor: Dweldian magi don't enter the Realm of Thrones when they die. Instead their souls are drawn to great works of magic.

cards.name: Street Wraith
cards.text:
Swampwalk
Cycling—Pay 2 life. (Pay 2 life, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
cards.flavor: The lamps on Wyndmoor Street snuff themselves at midnight and refuse to relight, afraid to illuminate what lies in the darkness.

cards.name: Stronghold Rats
cards.text:
Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Whenever Stronghold Rats deals combat damage to a player, each player discards a card.
cards.flavor: In the stronghold's dungeons, the shadows hide in the vermin.

cards.name: Summoner's Pact
cards.text:
Search your library for a green creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{G}{G}. If you don't, you lose the game.

cards.name: Sword of the Meek
Take Possession
cards.text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Enchant permanent
You control enchanted permanent.

cards.name: Tarmogoyf
cards.text: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

cards.name: Tarox Bladewing
cards.text:
Flying, haste
Grandeur — Discard another card named Tarox Bladewing: Tarox Bladewing gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.
cards.flavor: Despising his siblings as insults to his line, he finds and devours each in turn.

cards.name: Thornweald Archer
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor: Their arrows are tipped with basilisk eyes and fletched with cockatrice feathers.

cards.name: Thunderblade Charge
cards.text:
Thunderblade Charge deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, if Thunderblade Charge is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{R}{R}{R}. If you do, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

cards.name: Tolaria West
cards.text:
Tolaria West enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with converted mana cost 0, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

cards.name: Tombstalker
cards.text:
Flying
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)

cards.name: Unblinking Bleb
cards.text:
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
Whenever Unblinking Bleb or another permanent is turned face up, you may scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Utopia Mycon
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Utopia Mycon.
Remove three spore counters from Utopia Mycon: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield.
Sacrifice a Saproling: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Vedalken Æthermage
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Vedalken Æthermage enters the battlefield, return target Sliver to its owner's hand.
Wizardcycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Wizard card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

cards.name: Veilstone Amulet
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, creatures you control can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control this turn.
cards.flavor: Sometimes it's ostentatious to go unseen.

cards.name: Venser's Diffusion
cards.text: Return target nonland permanent or suspended card to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: "Each reality is but the dream of another, and each sleeper a god unknowing."

cards.name: Venser, Shaper Savant
cards.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Venser, Shaper Savant enters the battlefield, return target spell or permanent to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: His marvels of artifice pale in comparison to the developing machinery of his mind.

cards.name: Virulent Sliver
cards.text: All Sliver creatures have poisonous 1. (Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

cards.name: Whetwheel
cards.text:
{X}{X}, {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Morph {3} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Whip-Spine Drake
cards.text:
Flying
Morph {2}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor:
"I swear the clouds were created just so the drakes would have a place to lurk."
—Kasharri, skyknight

cards.name: Witch's Mist
cards.text: {2}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Hear us, Overmother. Let the strong thrive under your gelatinous hand, and let the weak writhe under your serrated heel."
—Prayer of the devoted

cards.name: Wrap in Vigor
cards.text: Regenerate each creature you control.
cards.flavor: Some nature mages unknowingly took advantage of the temporal energies still swirling on Dominaria. What they mistook for healing magic was in fact the manipulation of time.

cards.name: Yixlid Jailer
cards.text: Cards in graveyards lose all abilities.
cards.flavor: "I have an eternity to know the souls who are bound here, to behold their every facet. But moments from now they will be gagged and masked, and they shall be known by none other."

cards.name: Zoetic Cavern
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
Morph {2} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
cards.flavor: Nothing lives within it, yet there is life.
